definition: tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

sentences.english: Using advanced Down Lamp light dissipation technology and modular design.
sentences.chinese: 採用先進的筒燈配光技術，模塊化設計。

sentences.english: LED downlight is used widely in general lighting because of its less energy conservation.
sentences.chinese: 筒燈以其節能的特點廣泛應用在日常照明中。

sentences.english: Through reasonable and Tongdeng colors with soft lighting design.
sentences.chinese: 通過合理的色彩搭配及筒燈柔和的燈光設計。
